table.name: vtiger_bhsagentgroup
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentgroup` ( `bhsagentgroupid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsagentgroup_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentgroupid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsagentgroupcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsagentgroupcf` ( `bhsagentgroupid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsagentgroupid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
